item.title: Summer 2018
item.description:
This summer, I’m working on a lot of stuff for work. So, I won’t have too much time to really delve into anything terribly complex. But, here’s a quick list of some things I plan to knock out over the next few months!
Feel free to make suggestions via Twitter or Facebook if you’re thus inclined!!!
1. Antonio Damasio The Strange Order of Things: Life, Feeling, and the Making of Cultures.

item.title: About Readings
item.description: This section will have book reviews about books I’m reading. There will also be a reading list. See the top menu section Reading.
